verbs.description: aurora police issue alert about [V: attempted] [ARG1: child abduction] police arrested a suspect friday who is accused of trying to kidnap a child on thursday a man in his 30s was taken into custody at about 3 50 p m friday police said the suspect is a stranger to the girl who was targeted aurora colo aurora colorado
